ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Recall context for survey
Notes: e.g., ''Thinking of your entire lifetime'' or ''Since April 1, 2020''

ElementDescription: Form used/assessment name
Have you ever talked about an alcohol problem of your own with anyone, regardless of whether you brought it up or they did?
(ASK IF H1 = 1) If you ever talked about an alcohol problem of your own with anyone, regardless of whether you brought it up or they did, did this happen in the last 12 months?
(ASK IF H1 = 1) Did you talk with a priest, pastor, minister, rabbi or other religious leader about your alcohol problem?
(ASK IF H1 = 1) Did you talk with a doctor or other health care worker about your alcohol problem?
(ASK IF H2DN = 1) How did you talk with the doctor or health care worker about your alcohol problem? (In person)
(ASK IF H2DN = 1) How did you talk with the doctor or health care worker about your alcohol problem? (By telephone)
(ASK IF H2DN = 1) How did you talk with the doctor or health care worker about your alcohol problem? (By video visit)
(ASK IF H2DN = 1) How did you talk with the doctor or health care worker about your alcohol problem? (No answer)
Have you ever gone to anyone - a doctor or physician, Alcoholics Anonymous (AA), a treatment agency, anyone at all - for a problem related in any way to your drinking?
(ASK IF H12 = 1) Did you ever go to a hospital, doctor, or general health or mental health program for your drinking?
(ASK IF H12 = 1) Did you go to a mutual-help group, such as Alcoholics Anonymous? These kind of groups are sometimes called self-help groups.
(ASK IF H13BN = 1) Which mutual-help groups did you go to? (Alcoholics Anonymous)
(ASK IF H13BN = 1) Which mutual-help groups did you go to? (Narcotics Anonymous)
(ASK IF H13BN = 1) Which mutual-help groups did you go to? (Smart Recovery)
(ASK IF H13BN = 1) Which mutual-help groups did you go to? (LifeRing)
(ASK IF H13BN = 1) Which mutual-help groups did you go to? (SOS)
(ASK IF H13BN = 1) Which mutual-help groups did you go to? (Women for Sobriety)
(ASK IF H13BN = 1) Which mutual-help groups did you go to? (Refuge Recovery)
(ASK IF H13BN = 1) Which mutual-help groups did you go to? (Some other group)
(ASK IF H13BN = 1) Which mutual-help groups did you go to? (No answer)
(ASK IF H12 = 1) Did you go to an alcohol or drug treatment program?
(ASK IF H12 = 1) Did you go to a DUI program?
(ASK IF H12 = 1) Did you go to a private therapist?
(ASK IF H12 = 1) Did you go for treatment for your drinking in the past 5 years?
(ASK IF H12CNA1 = 1) Did you go for treatment for your drinking in the last 12 months?
(ASK IF H12CNA1 = 1) When you last got treatment for your drinking, who paid for it?
Notes: 1 = Insurance paid for all of it; 2 = I paid some of the cost, and insurance paid some of the cost; 3 = I paid for all of it myself; 4 = Someone else paid for it (family member, friend, etc.); 5 = I wasn't charged; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: People differ a lot in their feelings about getting help for alcohol problems. Was there ever a time when you thought you should get alcohol treatment but didn't?
(ASK IF H22B) Was there ever a time in the past 5 years when you thought you should get alcohol treatment but didn't?
(ASK IF H22B) How much did money or financial concerns influence your decision to not get treatment?
Notes: 1 = Quite a lot; 2 = Some; 3 = A little; 4 = Not at all; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: (ASK IF H12 = 2) Did you ever get treatment from a substance abuse program for either alcohol or drugs?
(ASK IF J15 = 1) In the past 5 years, did you get treatment from a substance abuse program for either alcohol or drugs?
(ASK IF J15 = 1) Did you get treatment in the last 12 months?
(ASK IF J15 = 1) Was this treatment for a drinking problem, a drug problem or both?
Notes: 1 = Drinking problem; 2 = Drug problem; 3 = Both; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: (ASK IF H1 = 1 OR H12 = 1 OR J15 = 1) Have you ever taken a prescription medication to help you stop or cut down on drinking or to stop using drugs?
(ASK IF HN1 = 1) Was this medication for a drinking problem, a drug problem or both?
Notes: 1 = Drinking problem; 2 = Drug problem; 3 = Both; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: (ASK IF HN1 = 1) Who prescribed the medication(s) for your drinking/drug use? (Personal medical doctor (primary care doctor))
(ASK IF HN1 = 1) Who prescribed the medication(s) for your drinking/drug use? (Doctor at a treatment program)
(ASK IF HN1 = 1) Who prescribed the medication(s) for your drinking/drug use? (Therapist or psychiatrist)
(ASK IF HN1 = 1) Who prescribed the medication(s) for your drinking/drug use? (Someone else)
(ASK IF HN1 = 1) Who prescribed the medication(s) for your drinking/drug use? (No answer)
Have you ever used the internet to get help for your drinking, or to strengthen or maintain your recovery from an alcohol problem?

(ASK IF IH1 = 1) Which internet resources have you used to get help for your drinking or to strengthen or maintain your recovery from an alcohol problem? (A website that offers information about alcohol use, such as Drinker's Check-up, to assess or monitor your drinking)

(ASK IF IH1 = 1) Which internet resources have you used to get help for your drinking or to strengthen or maintain your recovery from an alcohol problem? (Online meetings of a mutual help organization, such as Alcoholics Anonymous or LifeRing)

(ASK IF IH1 = 1) Which internet resources have you used to get help for your drinking or to strengthen or maintain your recovery from an alcohol problem? (Social network sites focused on recovery, such as IntheRooms.com.)

(ASK IF IH1 = 1) Which internet resources have you used to get help for your drinking or to strengthen or maintain your recovery from an alcohol problem? (Social network site not focused on recovery, such as Facebook, to get help for your drinking, or to strengthen or maintain your recovery from an alcohol problem)

(ASK IF IH1 = 1) Which internet resources have you used to get help for your drinking or to strengthen or maintain your recovery from an alcohol problem? (A website that offers information about alcohol treatment programs to find treatment for yourself)
(ASK IF IH1 = 1) Which internet resources have you used to get help for your drinking or to strengthen or maintain your recovery from an alcohol problem? (Some other internet resource)
(ASK IF IH1 = 1) Which internet resources have you used to get help for your drinking or to strengthen or maintain your recovery from an alcohol problem? (No answer)
(ASK IF IH1 = 1) Which drinking goal or goals best fit what you had in mind when using the internet to obtain help for your drinking? (To learn more about my drinking)
(ASK IF IH1 = 1) Which drinking goal or goals best fit what you had in mind when using the internet to obtain help for your drinking? (To cut down on my drinking)
(ASK IF IH1 = 1) Which drinking goal or goals best fit what you had in mind when using the internet to obtain help for your drinking? (To quit drinking temporarily)
(ASK IF IH1 = 1) Which drinking goal or goals best fit what you had in mind when using the internet to obtain help for your drinking? (To completely abstain from alcohol)
(ASK IF IH1 = 1) Which drinking goal or goals best fit what you had in mind when using the internet to obtain help for your drinking? (To strengthen or maintain my recovery)
(ASK IF IH1 = 1) Which drinking goal or goals best fit what you had in mind when using the internet to obtain help for your drinking? (To find a place to go for treatment)
(ASK IF IH1 = 1) Which drinking goal or goals best fit what you had in mind when using the internet to obtain help for your drinking? (Something else)
(ASK IF IH1 = 1) Which drinking goal or goals best fit what you had in mind when using the internet to obtain help for your drinking? (No answer)

Have you ever used recovery support services, such as sober housing, recovery communities or recovery coaching, to quit drinking or using drugs or to maintain recovery from an alcohol or drug problem?
(ASK IF RSS1 = 1) Which of the following recovery support services have you used? (Sober living such as a halfway house, recovery home, Oxford House)
(ASK IF RSS1 = 1) Which of the following recovery support services have you used? (Recovery high school or college recovery program/community)
(ASK IF RSS1 = 1) Which of the following recovery support services have you used? (Recovery community center)

(ASK IF RSS1 = 1) Which of the following recovery support services have you used? (Faith-based recovery services such as a recovery support group provided by a church, synagogue, mosque, and etcetera)
(ASK IF RSS1 = 1) Which of the following recovery support services have you used? (State or local recovery community organization)
(ASK IF RSS1 = 1) Which of the following recovery support services have you used? (Recovery coaching)
(ASK IF RSS1 = 1) Which of the following recovery support services have you used? (Something else)
(ASK IF RSS1 = 1) Which of the following recovery support services have you used? (No answer)
Do you consider yourself to be in recovery, or that you used to have an alcohol or drug problem but don't now?
(ASK IF HN32 = 1) Is this recovery from a drinking problem, a drug problem or both?
Notes: 1 = Drinking problem; 2 = Drug problem; 3 = Both; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: (ASK IF HN32 = 1) How long have you been in recovery?
